content: only odd-numbered row are charted pay attention to colored sections for special instructions consider placing stitch markers between chart repetitions moving them each row that starts with a yellow stitch even row  row instructions k3 purl to last 3 stitches k3 this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2024 page 4 of 8 chart 1 work the pattern repeat 5 times 31 k yo 29 27 no st for the first repeat only work this st as k 25 garter border st for the next repeats work it as regular yo 23 21 pattern repeat cdd 19 17 ssk for the first repeat only work this st as k2tog 15 13 k2tog for the next repeats work it as regular cdd 11 increase the needle size optional 9 7 5 3 1 chart 2 work the pattern repeat 5 times 67 65 63 61 59 57 55 53 51 49 47 45 43 41 39 37 35 33 this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2024 page 5 of 8 chart 3 work the pattern repeat 5 times 107 105 103 101 99 97 95 93 91 89 87 85 83 81 79 77 75 73 71 69 sssk k3tog chart 4 work the pattern repeat 15 times 147 145 143 141 139 137 135 133 131 129 127 125 123 121 119 117 115 113 111 109 this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2024 page 6 of 8 chart 5 work the pattern repeat 15 times 157 155 153 151 149 the number of sts to be bound off with a single_crochet bind off bind off on row 159 right side according to the last row of chart 5 as follows using your crochet hook sctog 5 sts chain 8 sctog 4 sts x2 chain 8 sctog 3 sts chain 8 sctog 5 sts chain 8 sctog 3 sts chain 8 sctog 4 sts x2 chain 8 sctog 3 sts x15 on the end of the last repeat sctog all the last 5 sts break yarn bring the tail through the remaining stitches and pull tight to secure gently wash your shawl and block into shape wear the shawl with joy and happy knitting for pattern-related issues or questions please contact me at  aderizky ub@gmail com or instagram @arina_shofiya this pattern is for personal use only copying distribution or publication is not allowed ©arina2024 page 7 of 8 stitch count chart 1 chart 2 garter pattern after total sts in the garter pattern after total sts in the row row border sts repeat x5 repeat end of row border sts repeat x5 repeat end of row 1 6 2 1 17 33 6 20 1 107 3 6 4 1 27 35 6 20 1 107 5 6 5 1 32 37 6 20 1 107 7 6 7 1 42 39 6 20 1
